publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2236 Jack McConnell: Congratulations to Stonehouse Primary School—That the Parliament congratulates the children and staff of Stonehouse Primary School, together with the wider community of Stonehouse, for the links that they have developed with Mulanje Mission, Malawi; in particular applauds their efforts to raise over £2,000 to help with educational facilities in that area; notes the provision of teacher housing and a small chicken farm, also funded through their fundraising, and wishes them every success in their efforts to provide further support next year.
S3M-2236 Congratulations to Stonehouse Primary School (lodged on 20 June 2008) Karen Gillon*
S3M-2236 Congratulations to Stonehouse Primary School (lodged on 20 June 2008) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-2236 Congratulations to Stonehouse Primary School (lodged on 20 June 2008) Dr Richard Simpson*
